generated_description: geally refrigeration technology co. ltd. is a company based in dongguan, guangdong province, specializing in the design and manufacture of ice making and refrigeration solutions. the company offers a range of products including flake ice machines, block ice machines, tube ice machines, and cube ice machines. these products are widely used in various industries such as supermarkets, food processing, seafood, industrial manufacturing, concrete cooling, and more. geally is committed to technological innovation, lean manufacturing, and environmental sustainability, adhering to iso9001 and ce standards. the company has over 10 years of experience in the field and provides comprehensive ice system services, including customized solutions and after-sales support.
